description: Episode number 3 of Series "Phoenix". Episodes 5 and 6 of the television series Phoenix Laz is still slowing earning the trust of his colleagues as he now believes Balcescu motors had something to do with drilling out the chassis number on the bomb car. Laz is sent through the door first on the ensuing raid, ending his days as an undercover cop for good. Forensic's can find no link between the bombing and the garage. "Out of the Cold". After realising that Martin's Mine was robbed some months earlier, it becomes clear that the explosives used in the bombing came from the mine. On a night out to try and relieve some of the tension between Lochie, Laz, and Peter, Laz finds himself in strife when he protects his Senior Sergeant from the clutches of Francine, a transsexual with an eye for Lochie. He is sent for counselling to try and cope with his aggressive behavior, which in turn brings the team together for Laz has now won the boys trust.
